abilities.name: Sympathetic Recovery
abilities.description: Healing allies with Caduceus Staff heals you.

abilities.name: Angelic Descent
abilities.description: Propelled by her Valkyrie suit, Mercy slows the speed of her descent from great heights.

abilities.name: Caduceus Staff
abilities.description: Mercy engages one of two beams that connect to an ally. By maintaining the beams, she can either restore that ally's health or increase the amount of damage they deal. Beams ignore barriers and will linger for a short duration if the target breaks line-of-sight or moves out of range.

abilities.name: Caduceus Blaster
abilities.description:
Mercy shoots a fast moving projectile from her sidearm. It's best reserved for emergency personal defense.
Can headshot.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Fly towards an ally. While in flight, Jump launches you forward, and Crouch launches you upward.

abilities.name: Resurrect
abilities.description: Mercy radiates restorative power, bringing nearby dead allies back into the fight with full health. Mercy is slowed significantly while performing resurrection.

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.description:
Valkyrie unleashes the full power of Mercy’s Valkyrie suit, enhancing her weapons and abilities for a limited duration.
 - Regeneration (Support Passive): Always active, uninterruptable
 - Hover: Mercy can now fly freely, at increased speed
 - Caduceus Staff: Increased output/range/chains nearby allies
 - Caduceus Blaster: ∞ ammo, increased projectile speed
 - Guardian Angel: Increased range and speed
